Title: Code injection in Nextcloud Desktop Client for macOS

CWE.name: Improper Control of Generation of Code (Code Injection)

Description: A code injection in Nextcloud Desktop Client 2.6.2 for macOS allowed to load arbitrary code when starting the client with DYLD_INSERT_LIBRARIES set in the enviroment.
Resolution: It is recommended that the Nextcloud Desktop Client is upgraded to 2.6.3.
